LanguageData.TuskPot.label: tusk pot
LanguageData.TuskPot.description: Designed by the honorable Shinzhor of Shinzaram, this lovely horn offers a charming alternative to plant your flowers in.
LanguageData.TuskPot_Blueprint.label: tusk pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.TuskPot_Blueprint_Install.label: tusk pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.TuskPot_Frame.label: tusk pot (building)
LanguageData.TuskPot_Frame.description: Designed by the honorable Shinzhor of Shinzaram, this lovely horn offers a charming alternative to plant your flowers in.
LanguageData.PlantPot.label: plant pot
LanguageData.PlantPot.description: A plant pot that can hold decorative flowers to improve the mood of people nearby.
LanguageData.PlantPot_Blueprint.label: plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PlantPot_Blueprint_Install.label: plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PlantPot_Frame.label: plant pot (building)
LanguageData.PlantPot_Frame.description: A plant pot that can hold decorative flowers to improve the mood of people nearby.

LanguageData.DecoratedPot_Frame.label: decorated pot (building)

LanguageData.PentaPlantPot.label: penta plant pot
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot.description: Roses are red, violets are blue, we love our Penta Pot, and so will you!
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot_Blueprint.label: penta plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot_Blueprint_Install.label: penta plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot_Frame.label: penta plant pot (building)
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot_Frame.description: Roses are red, violets are blue, we love our Penta Pot, and so will you!
LanguageData.StandingLamp.label: standinglLamp (white)
LanguageData.StandingLamp.description: A standing lamp that lights an area. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blueprint.label: standinglLamp (white) (blueprint)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: standinglLamp (white) (blueprint)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Frame.label: standinglLamp (white) (building)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Frame.description: A standing lamp that lights an area. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Red.label: standing lamp (red)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Red.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in a red glow. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Red_Blueprint_Install.label: standing lamp (red) (blueprint)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Green.label: standing lamp (green)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Green.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in a green glow. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blue.label: standing lamp (blue)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blue.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in blue glow. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.ClutterFloorLampA.label: floor lamp
LanguageData.ClutterFloorLampA.description: People need light to move and work at full speed. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.ClutterFloorLampA_Blueprint.label: floor lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterFloorLampA_Frame.label: floor lamp (building)
LanguageData.ClutterFloorLampA_Frame.description: People need light to move and work at full speed. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.CeilingLamp.label: ceiling lamp
LanguageData.CeilingLamp.description: A ceiling lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Must be placed under a roof. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.CeilingLamp_Blueprint.label: ceiling lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.CeilingLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: ceiling lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.CeilingLamp_Frame.label: ceiling lamp (building)
LanguageData.CeilingLamp_Frame.description: A ceiling lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Must be placed under a roof. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.TorchLamp.label: torch lamp
LanguageData.TorchLamp.description: A wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be refueled. Produces a small amount of heat.
LanguageData.TorchLamp_Blueprint.label: torch lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.TorchLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: torch lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.TorchLamp_Frame.label: torch lamp (building)
LanguageData.TorchLamp_Frame.description: A wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be refueled. Produces a small amount of heat.
LanguageData.BowlLamp.label: bowl lamp
LanguageData.BowlLamp.description: A bright and warm little fire, perfectly contained in a bowl. People need light to move and work at full speed.
LanguageData.BowlLamp_Blueprint.label: bowl lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.BowlLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: bowl lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.BowlLamp_Frame.label: bowl lamp (building)
LanguageData.BowlLamp_Frame.description: A bright and warm little fire, perfectly contained in a bowl. People need light to move and work at full speed.
LanguageData.WallTorch.label: wall torch
LanguageData.WallTorch.description: A wall mounted torch for lighting an area. Can be refueled. Not a good source of heat. Must be placed on a wall. People need light to move and work at full speed.
LanguageData.WallTorch_Blueprint.label: wall torch (blueprint)
LanguageData.WallTorch_Blueprint_Install.label: wall torch (blueprint)
LanguageData.WallTorch_Frame.label: wall torch (building)
LanguageData.WallTorch_Frame.description: A wall mounted torch for lighting an area. Can be refueled. Not a good source of heat. Must be placed on a wall. People need light to move and work at full speed.
LanguageData.Candle.label: candle
LanguageData.Candle.description: People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be refueled. Not a good source of heat.
LanguageData.Candle_Blueprint.label: candle (blueprint)
LanguageData.Candle_Blueprint_Install.label: candle (blueprint)
LanguageData.Candle_Frame.label: candle (building)
LanguageData.Candle_Frame.description: People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be refueled. Not a good source of heat.
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp.label: glowstone lamp
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp.description: A beautiful lamp topped with glowstone, emitting reflected light from dozen of glowstones. People need light to move and work at full speed. Free source of light.
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp_Blueprint.label: glowstone lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: glowstone lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp_Frame.label: glowstone lamp (building)
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp_Frame.description: A beautiful lamp topped with glowstone, emitting reflected light from dozen of glowstones. People need light to move and work at full speed. Free source of light.
LanguageData.OutdoorGroundLamp.label: outdoor lamp
LanguageData.OutdoorGroundLamp.description: A small ground lamp that is powered by the sun. People need light to move and work at full speed. It lights a small area outdoors.
LanguageData.OutdoorGroundLamp_Blueprint.label: outdoor lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.OutdoorGroundLamp_Frame.label: outdoor lamp (building)
LanguageData.OutdoorGroundLamp_Frame.description: A small ground lamp that is powered by the sun. People need light to move and work at full speed. It lights a small area outdoors.
LanguageData.Lighting_PathLamp.label: path light
LanguageData.Lighting_PathLamp.description: Small light with built in solar panel that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.
LanguageData.Lighting_PathLamp_Blueprint.label: path light (blueprint)
LanguageData.Lighting_PathLamp_Frame.label: path light (building)
LanguageData.Lighting_PathLamp_Frame.description: Small light with built in solar panel that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.
LanguageData.WallLamp.label: wall lamp
LanguageData.WallLamp.description: A lamp that must be placed against a supporting wall. People need light to move and work at full speed. Requires 80 W. It has a bigger glow than most lights.
LanguageData.WallLamp_Blueprint.label: wall lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.WallLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: wall lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.WallLamp_Frame.label: wall lamp (building)
LanguageData.WallLamp_Frame.description: A lamp that must be placed against a supporting wall. People need light to move and work at full speed. Requires 80 W. It has a bigger glow than most lights.
LanguageData.Lighting_WallLight.label: wall light
LanguageData.Lighting_WallLight.description: A small light that must be placed on a supporting wall. People need light to move and work at full speed. Requires 70 W.
LanguageData.Lighting_WallLight_Blueprint.label: wall light (blueprint)
LanguageData.Lighting_WallLight_Frame.label: wall light (building)
LanguageData.Lighting_WallLight_Frame.description: A small light that must be placed on a supporting wall. People need light to move and work at full speed. Requires 70 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare.label: square floor light (white)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a white lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blueprint.label: square floor light (white) (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blueprint_Install.label: square floor light (white) (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Frame.label: square floor light (white) (building)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Frame.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a white lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Red.label: square floor light (red)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Red.description: A square floor light integraded into the ground with a red lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Red_Blueprint.label: square floor light (red) (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Red_Frame.label: square floor light (red) (building)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Red_Frame.description: A square floor light integraded into the ground with a red lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Green.label: square floor light (green)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Green.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a green lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Green_Blueprint.label: square floor light (green) (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Green_Frame.label: square floor light (green) (building)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Green_Frame.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a green lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blue.label: square floor light (blue)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blue.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a blue lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blue_Blueprint.label: square floor light (blue) (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blue_Frame.label: square floor light (blue) (building)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blue_Frame.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a blue lamp. People need light to move and work at full speed. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
